title: Affiliate Program
heroDescription: Earn money by referring new users to Lamix. Get paid for every successful referral and track your progress with our comprehensive dashboard.
earnDescription: Get paid when your referrals upgrade to premium
slugHelp: 4-12 characters, letters and numbers only. Example: ABC123

noReferralsTitle: No referrals yet. Share your link to get started!
